developer: MAV SZOLGALTATO KOZPONT ZARTKORUEN MUKODO RESZVENYTARSASAG
description:
Országbérlet és vármegyebérlet, vonatjegy, buszjegy, helyjegy vásárlás, késési biztosítás gyorsan és egyszerűen.
 
A MÁV+ alkalmazás hónapról-hónapra éri majd el a teljes funkcionalitást, várhatóan 2026-ban. A régi alkalmazás addig változatlanul használható marad, de újabb funkciók ott már nem várhatók.
Jelenleg elérhető díjtermékek és főbb funkciók a MÁV+ alkalmazásban:
- Országbérlet, vármegyebérlet, Magyarország24 és Vármegye24 díjtermékek vásárlása egyszerűbben és gyorsabban megvásárolható, megszűnt a bérletigazolvány. A viszonylati jegyek érkezése még nyár előtt várható!
- Vonatjegy, buszjegy vásárlás a MÁV-csoport helyközi járataira
- Késési biztosításhoz kapcsolódó funkciók
- Helyjegyvásárlás letisztult, átlátható módon. Egyszerűbbé tettük a távolsági buszok esetén is a helyjegyek vásárlásának menetét.
- Útvonaltervezés már nem csak busszal vagy vonattal, hanem háztól-házig bármilyen helyközi vagy helyi járattal lehetséges. A helyi járatokra való jegyvásárlás azonban még nem érhető el.
- Gyorsabb bejelentkezés és fizetési megoldások, így már qvik és mobiltárcás fizetésre is van lehetőség van a SIMPLE rendszerén keresztül.
 
Visszajelzést később a jegy.mav.hu/feedback oldalon közvetlenül a fejlesztő csapatnak juttathatja el.

Join the millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you’re running an errand across town or exploring a city far from home, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable, whether you're requesting a taxi for a trip or arranging a train journey.

Pick from a wide range of travel options that the Uber app has to offer including:
UberX: Affordable, everyday rides
Lux: Luxury cars with top-rated drivers for premium travel experiences
Electric: Sustainable rides in electric vehicles for eco-friendly trips
UberXL: Rides for groups up to 6, perfect for family trips
Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom to enhance your travel
Uber Pet: Ride with your pet
Reserve: Choose your exact pickup time up to 90 days in advance for planned trips
Exec: High-end cars with top-rated drivers, ideal for business travel
2-wheels: You can also bike or ride a scooter with the Uber app. Find a scooter to start riding today for quick trips
Assist: Special assistance from trained drivers for accessible travel
Access: Wheelchair accessible vehicles ensuring inclusivity in travel
Black Cab: travel with the iconic London taxi

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival, whether it's a taxi ride or train. 

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable in their travel and on trips.

AFFORDABLE PRICING
We’re doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.
Split Fare: Don’t worry about doing the math later—split the cost evenly while you’re still on the ride.

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from £0 Delivery Fee and up to 5% off eligible delivery and pickup orders, 5-10% off eligible rides, and £5 credit if our Latest Arrival Estimate on your order is off. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence. Extra wait time included to meet your ride. Cancel at no charge up to 60 minutes in advance.

TRAVEL
Get train, coach, and flight ticketing right on the Uber app. Get 10% back in Uber Credits and collect Avios when you book train, coach, and Eurostar trips. No booking fee. Make any flight flexible and refundable and avoid flight travel stress with flight disruption protection.

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. With a growing fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles, you can choose eco-friendly rides to reduce your carbon footprint.

RENT CARS
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. Get great prices & selection from the best rental companies.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favourite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience, and pet supplies, and get them all delivered.
Uber Boat: Get fast, reliable river boat services in London. For commuters and visitors. Routes run from 24 piers across the capital.
Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.

Uber is available in the following cities: London, Manchester, Leeds, Glasgow, and more. Check if Uber is available in your city at https://www.uber.com/cities. Stay updated on the latest news, promotions, and offers by following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber and liking us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed.

Make getting around easier with Bolt! Whether you need a ride across town, an airport transfer, or a scooter to zip through traffic, our app makes it easy to move around confidently and conveniently.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT?
- Request a ride in seconds: enjoy safe, affordable rides with top-rated drivers.
- Transparent pricing: see your fare upfront so there are no surprises.
- Multiple payment options: pay securely using a credit/debit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or cash.

EASY ORDERING:
- Open the app and set your destination.
- Choose from various ride types to suit your needs (Comfort, Premium, Electric, XL, and more).
- Track your driver in real time.
- Arrive in comfort and rate your experience.

SAFETY FIRST:
Some of Bolt’s safety features require the app to run in the background.

- Emergency assist button: discreetly alert our Safety Team in case of emergencies.
- Audio trip recording: record audio during rides for added peace of mind.
- Private phone details: your contact information stays confidential when you call a driver.

PLAN AHEAD:
Need an airport transfer or an early morning ride? You can schedule your trip in advance from 30 minutes to 90 days before your expected pickup time.

*JOIN BOLT PLUS TO UNLOCK PREMIUM FEATURES!
Get the best of Bolt with Bolt Plus. Enjoy exclusive perks that save you time and money, making every ride smoother and more convenient.

*BOLT DRIVE:
We're committed to our carbon net zero goal by 2040. That's why we're increasing the lineup of electric and hybrid cars in Bolt Drive, our car-sharing service. You can also rent Bolt scooters and e-bikes via the app.

*DELIVER PACKAGES
Use the 'Send' ride type to arrange fast and convenient parcel delivery in your city.

Bolt is available in 50 countries and 600+ cities worldwide (see the full list at https://bolt.eu/en/cities/). We rebranded from Taxify to Bolt in 2019.

Bolt is the perfect taxi alternative for fast, reliable, and affordable rides. The app provides a seamless ride-ordering experience whether you’re commuting, travelling, or running errands. So, the next time you need a ride, choose Bolt!

*Bolt options differ by location. Check the app for availability in your city.

Earn money driving with the Bolt Driver app. Sign up: https://bolt.eu/driver/

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at https://bolt.eu

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts, and offers!

Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/Bolt/
Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/bolt
X — https://x.com/Boltapp

With this App at your fingertips, Europe is at your feet.

We’re Ryanair, so of course you’ll find the lowest fares in Europe on our app. But you’ll also get handy extras like being able to check in while you’re on the move, a mobile boarding pass delivered straight to your phone and a choice of in-flight extras in one quick click.

So why are you still reading? Download it now and get flying!

developer: BKK Budapesti Kozlekedesi Kozpont Zartkoruen Mukodo Reszvenytarsasag
description:
The FUTÁR application by BKK Centre for Budapest Transport has been renewed under the name BudapestGO, which, in addition to real-time route planning, has been extended with new functions: you can buy digital single tickets, daily and weekly travelcards or passes in the application and you can also be informed immediately about the current transport service changes. You can use the route planner with a cleaner and clearer interface, facilitated by a number of new features.

New features in the app:
- Ticket and pass purchase, journey planning in a single app
- Digital single ticket now also available
- Automatic pass renewal
- Traffic information (BKK Info application integrated)
- Personalised transport updates via push message
- Trip planning for trains and suburban railways available with a BKK-pass
- Simplified interface
- You can buy local or intercity tickets and passes for most municipalities in Hungary.

Plan every getaway with ease as a friendly guide walks you from first idea to final packing check. Keep upcoming adventures organized, refreshed, and inspiring with helpful prompts waiting on your home dashboard. Build custom packing lists in seconds, track progress, and stay under luggage limits with smart reminders. Turn itinerary chaos into calm by grouping flights, stays, and activities in a clean, scrollable timeline. Swap currency amounts effortlessly, skim essential travel tips, and save emergency numbers for peace of mind. Let thoughtful suggestions adjust to your trip so you feel ready the moment departure day arrives.

Download the highest-rated travel app and join thousands of people finding hotel, motel and holiday home travel deals. Find a stay for your holiday, weekend getaway or business trip, anywhere in the world!

Search for hotels, motels & holiday homes

• 27 million hotels, holiday rentals, homes, apartments and other unique places to stay
• Search by city, attraction, landmark or hotel name with just one tap
• Filter by price, review score, amenities and other things important to you
• Find your last-minute stay or book far in advance

Find a great travel deal

• Daily deals for every budget
• Free cancellation on most rooms
• Browse over 135 million verified guest reviews

Manage your booking on the go

• Get paperless confirmation
• Make changes whenever, wherever
• 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages
• Contact your host, view check-in times and write reviews
• No booking or credit card fees

developer: MAV SZOLGALTATO KOZPONT ZARTKORUEN MUKODO RESZVENYTARSASAG
description:
MÁV – a hivatalos vasúti belföldi utazástervező!

A MÁV-START alkalmazása hasznos segítséget nyújt utazása megtervezéséhez, amihez az alkalmazásból a jegyét is megvásárolhatja. A MÁV applikáció mindent tud a vonatokról: az utazás időpontja, az indulási és érkezési hely, valamint az igénybe vehető kedvezmények kiválasztását követően segít az optimális útvonal kiválasztásában. Emellett a menetrend alapján információt ad az esetleges átszállásokról és az állomásokról, megjeleníti a menetjegy árát, jelzi a pótjegyváltási kötelezettséget. A jegyeket egy gombnyomással a kosárba teheti, majd bankkártyával kifizetheti. A vásárlási beállítások, adatok elmenthetők, így a következő alkalommal még egyszerűbb lesz a vásárlás. A MÁV applikáció használatával a vonatok aktuális helyzetét is könnyedén nyomon követheti a valós idejű adatokat használó térképen. Továbbá teljesen egyedi funkcióként valós idejű csevegés folytatható a vonaton utazó utastársakkal.

MÁV applikáció – official journey planner for train travels within Hungary.

The application of the MAV-START Co. is useful for planning train travel, and the tickets can also be purchased within the application. MÁV app knows everything about the trains: after setting the date of travel, departure and destination station and available discounts it helps you choosing the best journey. It also provides information about the stations, changing trains; displays price of the set journey; indicates trains with obligatory surcharge. Tickets can be placed in the basket with one tap, and can be paid with credit card. Purchase settings and data can be saved that makes future purchases even smoother. MÁV app enables tracing the trains real-time on the map easily. Unique function of the app is the real-time chat with fellow passengers on the same train.

Újdonságok:
Jegyvásárlás:
-	az utazási beállítások és az utasok adatai elmenthetők, így nem kell minden alkalommal újra megadni az utas adatait.
-	a beépített SimplePay fizetési alkalmazásban kívánság szerint a fizetésre használt bankkártya adatok elmenthetők (ezeket a MÁV-START nem kezeli)
- teljesen átdolgozott felhasználói felület, a sztenderd gesztusok használata

SIMPLY SEARCH AND BOOK 
What could be better than low-cost flight deals? Select from 200+ destinations, choose your ideal travel date and get set for cheap flights the easy way with the WIZZ Air flight deal and travel app.

ORGANISE YOUR ENTIRE HOLIDAY  
- Get flight deals via push notifications 
- Scan your documents for a faster booking and check-in process 
- Check in with your confirmation details and say goodbye to printing*  
- Check out your flight schedule and track your plane in real-time 
- Share flight searches with friends and family or send travel companions their boarding pass  
- Save your ticket to your Apple Wallet plus all your important travel documents to the app 
- Use the in-app boarding card – either online or offline! 
Fly to the most popular destinations across Europe, from Bucharest, Budapest, Krakow, Tirana and Vienna, to Lisbon, Rome, Naples, Milan, Malaga, Madrid and Athens.  Check out our low cost flights to the Middle East and places like Abu Dhabi, Alexandria, Amman, Muscat and Tel Aviv. 

FARE FINDER: 
Search for the lowest available fare for your journey and book your ticket at the best price.

HOTELS 
Reserve your hotel with Booking.com and get 5% of your booking value back as a WIZZ credit. 

WIZZ DISCOUNT CLUB 
Sign up to a WIZZ Discount Club membership and get discounted flight fares. 

AIRPORT TRANSFER:
Book a ride to and from the airport with our airport transfer service.

USE THE APP TO BUY AIRPORT EXTRAS LIKE… 
- Fast Track boarding and Lounge access  
- Car rental with Rentalcars.com where you can receive a 5% of your booking back as WIZZ credit value 
- Bus transfers at cheap prices from the airport to the centre of your destination city  

WIZZ MAGAZINE 
Stay entertained on board by downloading the WIZZ in-flight magazine before you board.

ADD SERVICES 
Want to add more luggage or change your reserved seat? No worries, you can add many travel-related services through the app. 

Follow WIZZ on social media for all of the latest news, offers and competitions  

Facebook @wizzair 
Instagram @wizzair 
Twitter @wizzair 

Available in almost 20 languages 
Arabic, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Dutch, English, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Ukrainian 

*Only at airports with permitted access.

AIRBNB MORE THAN AN AIRBNB
The world is endlessly interesting and with Airbnb, you can explore it in more ways than ever. Find remarkable homes, unforgettable experiences and incredible services all in one app. Get inspired, book and go.

BOOK A HOME AND GO WHERE HOTELS CAN’T
Explore 8+ million holiday rentals in 240+ countries and regions to find the perfect stay for every kind of trip, whether you’re travelling alone or with a group. Use over 80 filtering options to find the amenities you want, like a pool, a kitchen or accessibility features like step-free entry. View all the details of a place at a glance on the listing page and check out the ratings and reviews to see what other guests who’ve stayed there think about it too.

DON’T JUST SEE A PLACE, EXPERIENCE IT
Find thousands of experiences around the world, hosted by locals who know their city best – all vetted for quality based on a host’s expertise, reputation and authenticity. Uncover unique perspectives on landmarks and museums. Get a taste of local cuisine through cooking classes and food tours. Enjoy the great outdoors, an art workshop, a live performance and much more. Plus, check out Airbnb Originals – extraordinary experiences hosted by the world’s most interesting people, designed exclusively for Airbnb.

MAKE YOUR STAY EVEN MORE SPECIAL WITH INCREDIBLE SERVICES
Make the most of your stay by booking incredible services right at your Airbnb, like private chefs, photography, catering, prepared meals, hairstyling, nail treatments, make-up, massages, personal training and spa treatments – each offered by experienced service hosts who have been vetted for quality. You can book thousands of professional services at nearly every price, all in one app, all over the world. Best of all, you don’t need to stay at an Airbnb or even be on a trip to get these services. Schedule a blow-dry, training session and more right at home.

GET A TRAVEL APP THAT TRAVELS WITH YOU
After you book a home, you’ll get personalised recommendations on the home page suggesting services and experiences for your trip, tailored to where you’re staying and who you’re travelling with. And the redesigned Profile gives you a snapshot of all the places you’ve been to on Airbnb and the people you’ve met along the way.

FIND ALL YOUR TRIP INFO IN ONE PLACE
Quickly find or share the details of your reservation – making it easier for everyone to get there, get inside and get connected to wifi with just a tap. Our in-app messaging means every guest on the trip can easily communicate with hosts to say hi, ask questions and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates. You can also share photos, videos and even customise an Airbnb Service, all in the same chat. And with a day-by-day view of everything you’ve booked in the updated Trips tab, it’s simple to keep track of your plans and get key details like check-in times, special instructions and entry codes all in one place, even when you’re offline.

WANT TO HOST? AIRBNB MAKES IT EASY.
Whether you want to host a home, experience or service, you can reach millions of people travelling and grow your business on Airbnb. List your home in a few simple steps. Or, you can apply to host an experience or service and once approved, you’re ready to welcome the world.

YOU’VE COME THIS FAR – NOW GO FURTHER
Stop reading and fire up the app to book yourself a one-of-a-kind trip on Airbnb.

Download the GetYourGuide app to discover and book unforgettable travel experiences anywhere in the world

Whether you're planning a vacation or looking for last-minute things to do in any destination, we make booking tours, day trips, and activities easier than ever. Choose from culture, food, adventure, nature, and more experiences.

Maximize your trip with exclusive access to the world's top attractions and museums, find the highlights and hidden gems, and keep up with last-minute travel deals using the app — we make travel planning easy, and making memories easier.

Find over 75,000 experiences

Booking tickets for unmissable sights has never been easier — experience the Colosseum, Eiffel Tower, London Eye, TV Tower, Sagrada Familia, and more.

Discover expert-guided tours — explore unforgettable travel highlights in Paris, Dubai, London, Florence, New York City, Berlin, Vienna, New Orleans, Cancun, Tuscany, Lisbon, and more. Our app will be your city guide for destinations around the world, and our local experts help you get fully immersed.

Travel with flexibility

Reserve now, pay later — save your place for popular experiences early and make your payment at a later date.
Instant confirmation — whether you're booking tours in advance or need last-minute tickets, receive your tickets and booking confirmation instantly.
Offline tickets — Conveniently access your booking information offline. Download, store, and present your tickets on your mobile device

Book with confidence

24/7 customer service — Easily find help when you have questions. We offer customer service by email, phone, and in the app across multiple languages.
Flexible cancellation — Don’t stress if your plans change. We offer free cancellation up to 24 hours before your activity for most bookings.

With tours and activities for any interest, you can plan your trips your way. Dive into nature and explore fjords in Norway, try local cuisine across Europe, or uncover fascinating history in the United States.

Whether you're living the magic of the wizarding world on a Harry Potter experience, savoring delicious culinary delights on a food tour of Barcelona, booking top rated tours to see the Vatican, or following a city guide through Berlin, we guarantee you'll find something unforgettable to do — make the most of your travel and leisure time.

Uncover the top tourist activities in the world's bucket-list destinations:
Book museum tours and tickets in Rome, food trips through Naples, trekking in Iceland, river cruises around Prague, outdoor adventures in Bali, sightseeing in Budapest, and more.

Use the app as a travel planner or for travel guidance, then book travel experiences for the world's must-see highlights with excursions and last-minute tickets.

Tell us how we’re doing
Leave us a review if you’re enjoying your GetYourGuide app experience or head over to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact

developer: UNION Vienna Insurance Group Biztosito Zrt.
description:
A Drivello egy vezetéstámogató app, amellyel pénzt spórolhatsz a kötelező gépjármű-felelősségbiztosításon (KGFB), ráadásul ingyenes autó-asszisztenciát kapsz, és játékos kihívásokkal fejlesztheted a vezetési stílusod.  

‣ Miért érdemes letölteni?
   ‣ KGFB kedvezmény – Drivello-kedvezménnyel jelentős megtakarítást érhetsz el.
   ‣ Ingyenes autó-asszisztencia – Az appból hívható „Drivello Angyal” vészhelyzetben segít egy éven át.
   ‣ Vezetéstámogatás – Az app rögzíti és pontozza az útjaidat több szempont szerint. Segít megértened, hogy vezetés közben miben vagy jó, és min érdemes javítanod.  

‣ Drivellíra és nyeremények – Hívd meg ismerőseidet, teljesíts kihívásokat, gyűjts Drivellírát, ami a Drivello saját valutája és váltsd be a shopban értékes nyereményekre.  

‣ Drivello shop & kihívások – Jutalmak, közösségi élmény, motiváció a még biztonságosabb vezetésért.


Hogyan működik?  

1. Töltsd le és regisztrálj – add meg a szükséges adatokat, engedélyezd a kért hozzáféréseket.  
2. Automatikus mérés – az app a háttérben rögzíti az útjaidat (amikor vezetsz).  
3. Élvezd az előnyöket – kedvezőbb KGFB, asszisztencia, kihívások, shop.  


Megjegyzés  

A folyamatos GPS és helymeghatározás használata csökkenti a készülék akkumulátorának üzemidejét. A Drivello a lehető legkevesebb energiát fogyasztja a működéshez.  

A Drivello mögött álló UNION Biztosító a felhasználói magánélet védelme érdekében felhasználó által megtett utakat, útvonalakat nem látja.

The world's best flight tracker app - #1 Travel app in over 150 countries.

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a live flight tracker and see planes around the world move in real-time on a detailed map. Or point your device at a plane to find out where it’s going and what kind of aircraft it is. Download for free today and discover why millions are already tracking flights and checking flight status with Flightradar24.

• Watch aircraft move around the world in real-time
• Identify flights overhead & see flight information—including a photo of the actual aircraft—by simply pointing your device at the sky 
• See what the pilot of an aircraft sees in 3D 
• Tap on a plane for flight details such as route, estimated time of arrival, actual time of departure, aircraft type, speed, altitude, high-resolution photos of the actual aircraft & more.
• See historical data & watch playback of past flights
• Tap on an airport icon for arrival & departure boards, flight status, aircraft on the ground, current delay stats, & detailed weather conditions
• Search and bookmark individual flights using flight number, airport, or airline
• Filter flights by airline, aircraft, altitude, speed, & more
• Get a detailed list of all flights in your area.
• View aircraft in 3D with hundreds of new aircraft and airline liveries added.

Flightradar24 is a free app and includes all the above features. If you want even more great features from Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker there are upgrade options—Silver & Gold—and each comes with a free trial.
 
SILVER

• 90 days of flight history
• More aircraft details
• More flight details, like vertical speed & squawk
• Filters and alerts to find and track flights
• Current weather at 3,000+ airports overlaid on the map
 
GOLD

• All the features included in Flightradar24 Silver +
• 365 days of flight history
• Detailed live map weather layers for clouds & precipitation
• Aeronautical charts & oceanic tracks showing the pathways flights follow across the sky
• Air traffic control boundaries that show which controllers are responsible for a flight
• Extended Mode S data— even more information about a flight’s altitude, speed, and wind & temperature conditions
 
If you choose to upgrade to a Silver or Gold subscription, a payment will be charged to your iTunes account at the end of the free trial period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your account settings in the iTunes Store. Silver and Gold upgrade prices are listed in the app as they vary depending on your country and currency. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

HOW IT WORKS

Most aircraft today are equipped with ADS-B transponders that transmit positional data. Flightradar24 has a rapidly growing network of 50,000 ground stations around the world to receive this data that then shows up as aircraft moving on a map in the app. In an expanding number of regions, with the help of multilateration (MLAT), we’re able to calculate the positions of aircraft that don’t have ADS-B transponders. 

CONNECT WITH US

We love getting feedback on FR24. Since we’re unable to respond directly to reviews, you can contact us directly and we’ll be happy to assist.
• Email (support@fr24.com)
• X (@Flightradar24)
• Facebook (@Flightradar24)
• YouTube (@Flightradar24DotCom)

DISCLAIMER

The use of this app is strictly limited to entertainment purposes. This specifically excludes activities that might endanger yourself or the lives of others. Under no circumstances will the developer of this app be held responsible for incidents resulting from the use of the data or its interpretation or its use contrary to this agreement.

Terms of Service: https://www.flightradar24.com/terms-and-conditions
EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula

developer: CData-Terkeptar Informatikai Fejleszto es Tanacsado Kft.
description:
A menetrendek.hu weboldal iOS-re megírt változata, amely online közös kereső a Magyarországon közlekedő helyközi buszokhoz, vonatokhoz, illetve balatoni hajókhoz. Az app a Volán társaságok hivatalos keresője is. A Volán, a MÁV, és a Bahart több mint 20000 megállóhelye, és az ország összes települése közötti keresést biztosítja.

A szoftver megállók és települések közti eljutások keresésére képes. A beviteli mezőben teljes és részleges egyezéskor is ad találatot, például "bp st" megadásával kihozható "Budapest, Stadion autóbusz-pályaudvar". A szoftver egy adott megállóhelyre indulási, illetve érkezési jegyzéket is képes adni. Ehhez elég csak az egyik beviteli mezőt kitölteni és úgy végezni egy keresést.

A szoftver a telefon beépített GPS-ével az indulási megállóhelyet is meghatározhatja. Megállóhely kereséskor a beírómezőben megjelenő pozíció jelölőt megérintve, az alkalmazás 1500m távolságon belüli legközelebbi megállóhelyet megkeresi. A beállításokban megadott időintervallumra előre, a megadott időponttól jeleníti meg. 

A szoftver találati listája, a webes változattal összhangban, a "BEÁLLÍTÁSOK" segítségével  finomhangolható. Lehetőség van a találatok rendezésére indulási és érkezési idő, menetidő, jegyár (jelenleg csak Volán kereséskor), illetve átszállás szerint. Megadható az átszállási idők időtartama, illetve a maximális gyaloglás hossza is.

A legutolsó 20 lekérés automatikusan elmentésre kerül és az "ELŐZMÉNYEK" menüpontból érhető el. A legutóbbi lekérések internet nélkül is megtekinthetőek az előzményekben, illetve ha van kapcsolat, frissíthetők is. Az előzmények törölhetőek is a listából. A bármely napra való kereshetőség biztosítja, hogy a hét közbeni, és a hétvégi menetrendeket egy táblázatba mentsük le.

A térkép a találati listából, és az indulási jegyzékből egy járat kiválasztása után, a részletes információkban a térkép ikon megérintésével előhívható. A térkép előhívásakor a kiválasztott járat induló, és érkező megállóhelye, valamint útvonala is látszik. A megállóhelynevet a jelölő pontot megérintve hívhatjuk elő. Amennyiben be van kapcsolva a tartózkodási hely, megjelenik a térképen a telefon GPS pozíciója is.

Aki utazik vonattal vagy busszal, azzal előfordul, hogy nem tud számítógép közelben lenni, hogy ellenőrizze a menetrendet. Ez az alkalmazás nekik készült, hogy gyorsan, egyszerűen, adatforgalom-takarékos módon kapjanak utazási információkat.

Kulcsszavak: vonat, busz, hajó, volán, vasút, menetrend, vasúti menetrend, vasútmenetrend, magyar, máv, MÁV, bahart, hajózás

Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy. Find the best prices on flights, hotels & rental cars – all in one place.

No matter where you are – search for cheap airline tickets, low-cost flights, and the best air fare deals to destinations worldwide. Easily find and book flights, Hotels and car hire with major airlines and providers  like Ryanair, easyJet, British Airways all in one place.  Save time and money by comparing fares across multiple airlines and travel booking platforms to get the best price. There are no booking fees or hidden charges—just the lowest prices on domestic and international flights.

But Skyscanner is more than just flights. Find budget-friendly hotels, luxury resorts, airport hotels, and holiday rentals with our hotel search, ensuring you have the perfect place to stay wherever you go. Need transportation? Compare and book affordable car hire from top providers, with options to filter by vehicle type, fuel policy, and more.
Here’s how to use our app:

Find inspiration
Can’t decide where to go? Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap ‘Everywhere’ in our search bar to find low-cost flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next holiday.

Filter your search
Know what you’re looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times. Looking for last-minute travel deals? Use filters to find flexible options and spontaneous getaways at the lowest prices.

The best time to fly
You’ve chosen where it will be, now to find the best dates to book your holiday. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we’ll let you know when the flight price changes so you’re always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right price
Thought we were just about discounted flights? Nope, we’ve got your stay covered too. Compare and book budget hotels, luxury resorts, holiday apartment rentals , motels and hostels all over the world. Or find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute hotel deal for your next holiday. 

Hire a car
Choose where and when to pick up your car hire, and we’ll show you affordable options from top car hire agencies, including Hertz, Avis, Enterprise and Europcar . You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you’re not paying too much on fuel – we’ve got your back. 

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel and airlines, including online travel agencies (OTA), in one place - easyJet, Ryanair, British Airways, Lufthansa, Wizz Air, Expedia, Booking.com, lastminute.com and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travellers. 

No added fees ever
Did we mention we don’t charge any booking fees? Never. None at all. Book directly with airlines, hotels, and travel agency services with total transparency.

Save your flights
Want to look but not ready to book a flight? No problem. We have a ‘saved’ feature where you can ‘heart’ flights or hotels you like. Then it’ll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and book your holiday. 

Why Skyscanner?
• The Telegraph; “The only 20 travel apps you’ll ever need”
• The New York Times; “Apps for Travelers Dreaming of Their Next Trip”
• Elite Daily; “7 holiday travel apps that’ll let you jingle around the world’
• Pocket-lint; “4 apps to get you ready for summer”

Parkl makes city driving easier! 

Manage your parking easily, use our chargers to charge your electric car or buy your e-vignette – all in one place! 

Digital parking made easy: enjoy the simple, cashless on-street and off-street parking, all without zone-searching. Parking is made even more convenient by features like overnight renewal or custom reminders. 

Smart charging solutions for electric cars: with a wide range of electric chargers in the app, Parkl makes the charging process easy to start and track through the app. 

Cashless payment: payment is made automatically after each transaction with the pre-registered credit card, so there is no need for coins or queuing at the parking machine. You can also request a monthly VAT invoice for your transactions. 

 

Off-street parking – You’ll always have space! 

Parkl shows the available off-street parking spaces (car parks and garages, hotels, apartment buildings, office garages) on an easy-to-use map. 
You can easily find the closest off-street parking option to your current location or the destination you have entered. 
You can use the app to open car park barriers on arrival and departure.  
If Instant Parking is available on a location, the number plate reader camera will open the gate for you. 
No need to take a parking ticket, the process can be managed and monitored from start to finish via the app. 
In most cases, you pay by the minute. 
Some car parks also offer the possibility to purchase daily, weekly or monthly parking passes. 

 

On-street parking - No more zone-hunting!   

With Parkl you can manage your street parking quickly and conveniently, regardless of the city. 

The app will automatically find the correct parking zone based on your location, but you can also find your zone on our map or enter it manually.   
By selecting your parking zone, you can also view the parking fee, the start and end of the payment period, and the minimum and maximum parking duration.  
You pay the exact amount for your parking: no prepaid balance and no blocked amount on your credit card!  
You can renew your expiring parking within or beyond the day, even automatically!  
You can set a reminder in the app, so you don't forget to cancel your parking.   

 

Electric charging - Try one of the largest charging networks in Hungary!  

With our app you can access a wide range of charging options and locations, from shopping centre car parks to office building chargers!  

You can quick start the process with the use of charger IDs.  
Use the map view to find and map charging points near you.  
Check if there is an available electric charging point at the chosen location.   
You can find detailed information on the price, connector type and power output of electric chargers in the app.  
Parkl notifies you about charging events via messages.  
Parking and charging in one app, conveniently! 

 

E-vignettes - Full digital mobility on the highway too!  

With the Parkl app you can easily purchase and manage your highway stickers, so you'll never hit the road unprepared!  

You can manage e-vignettes for multiple cars in one account. 
Buy a vignette for your car in no time at a low fee.  
Track the expiry of your valid vignettes to avoid potential penalties.  
By registering your car, you will always choose the right vignette! 

 
Parkl Fleet & Parkl Office - Private and business solutions in one app!  

Is your workplace a Parkl-partner already? With the Parkl ecosystem you can manage both private and business parking and charging. Track and invoice business parking and charging with Parkl Fleet or book and manage parking spaces at work with our Parkl Office solution.   

 

Download the Parkl app now and experience smart mobility! 

Follow us on: 

www.facebook.com/parklapp/ 

www.instagram.com/parklapp 

www.linkedin.com/company/parkl/  

www.parkl.net/en/

developer: GreenGo Car Europe Korlatolt Felelossegu Tarsasag
description:
GreenGo is the greenest form of shared mobility, offering an easily accessible and eco-friendly alternative for everyone. Our fleet of 500 fully electric cars is ready for you whenever you need a car. Enjoy the benefits of driving—without the downsides of maintenance, insurance, or cleaning. 
 
Register in just a few minutes: upload your driver's license (even if it's brand new, as long as you're over 18), add your bank card details, wait for quick approval, and you're good to go! Choose a pay-per-use option with no monthly fee or various subscription plans—including a special price plan for drivers under 25. 
 
With the GreenGo app, you have everything you need at your fingertips: 
• Open and lock GreenGos with ease. 
• Track all available cars, complete with their battery levels. 
• Reserve your chosen car in advance - or even have it delivered. 
• Check service area boundaries and see the different zones. 
• Enjoy long-range, spacious GreenGo Comfort models for extended trips or multi-day rentals, and keep the same car for up to 20 days! With Comfort, you can also choose from various Extras such as adding additional drivers, requesting a child seat, or even unlimited free kilometers. 
• Need to move house or transport goods? Rent a GreenGo Cargo with a huge storage capacity, available at hourly and daily rates. 
• Locate nearby GreenGo chargers. 
• Keep track of your rentals and invoices. 
• Manage discount coupons. 
• Customize your price plan with useful Addons to make it truly personal. 
• Invite your friends and earn bonus minutes for both of you!


CUSTOMER SERVICE
For questions about rentals, billing, payments, or anything about our service, reach out to us at help@greengo.com. But first, check our FAQ page - your answer might already be there: https://greengo.com/hu/gyakori-kerdesek

Need urgent help during a rental? Our 24/7 phone support is here for you: +36 1 999 6469

Welcome to the FlixBus app!


We are thrilled to announce that FlixBus, the world's largest bus network, is now available in India! 


With FlixBus, you can effortlessly book bus tickets from all our brands including FlixBus, Greyhound, Kamil Koç and FlixTrain, across Europe, North America, India, and South America. 


Easy and Sustainable Travel 

FlixBus simplifies travel by offering convenient and eco-friendly options. With the FlixBus app you can book bus tickets across Europe, North America, South America and India. 


Looking for travel inspiration?

Explore our route map and live timetables to find your next destination, whether you are looking for an exciting adventure in a bustling city or a tranquil getaway, FlixBus has you covered.


Why Choose the FlixBus App?
•	Keep all your bus tickets in one place.
•	Receive exclusive discounts only available on the app.
•	Quickly discover the cheapest bus tickets to your chosen destination.
•	Use the app to locate your stop effortlessly and navigate your way to it.
•	Travel without luggage hassles: enjoy one free checked bag and one carry-on with each ticket.
•	Reserve seats, book additional baggage, and manage your bookings effortlessly within the app.
•	Book bus tickets well in advance or opt for same-day travel for spontaneous trips.
•	Receive important trip updates directly to your phone. Stay up to date on delays or stop changes.
•	Whether you’ve lost something or have questions, our app has you covered with FAQs and convenient contact options.
•	Benefit from the extensive reach of the world's largest bus network.

How to book a bus ticket with FlixBus?

It's easy to buy a bus ticket with the FlixBus app: simply select your departure and arrival cities, pick your date to travel and then checkout with your preferred payment method! After booking you will receive a booking confirmation by email containing all your trip details


Why Travel with FlixBus?

Travel with FlixBus for a journey that combines comfort, safety, and convenience. Our buses are equipped with adjustable seats, air conditioning, personal power outlets, free Wi-Fi and onboard toilets. Safety is a priority for us, so rest assured that your journey will be in capable hands.
No need to worry about packing light - FlixBus offers a generous luggage policy: carry one 7kg bag (30cm x 18cm x 42cm), and one 20kg checked bag (50cm x 30cm x 80cm). Need more? Add an extra bag of carry-on dimensions directly through our app. Travel comfortably, knowing your belongings you don’t have to pack light.


Live Tracking and Timetables

Stay informed in real time with our live coach times and bus tracking features. Easily access e-tickets, keep an eye on live bus times while waiting for your bus, and track the progress of your journey. Use our live timetables to conveniently plan trips that fit your schedule and receive updates directly in the app.


Green Travel Initiative

FlixBus is dedicated to eco-friendly travel. We continuously strive to reduce our ecological footprint by using the latest environmentally friendly buses, optimizing routes, and utilizing efficient driving techniques. Our commitment to sustainability means every journey you take with us contributes to a greener future.


Join us on a journey that's not just about reaching your destination, but also about traveling responsibly and comfortably. With FlixBus, every trip is an experience.

developer: MOL Magyar Olaj- es Gazipari Nyrt.
description:
With our 600-strong fleet we ensure you always have a car at hand in Budapest. Forget charging, fueling, and paying for parking, rather get in a MOL Limo! The largest carsharing service in the Hungarian capital is just a stone's throw away:

Download the app, and register with your details in addition to uploading your driving licence. We'll let you know the status of your application within 24 hours via e-mail and if all your data is in order, your account will be activated.

Once your account has been activated, you can book a car through the application. The map shows all the available cars in the LIMO zone. The blue dot marks your location. Tap on the chosen car to see its data: license plate, type, whether it's electric or gas-powered, its fuel or charge level, parking location and its distance from you. You can book the car from the same page. From this point on, you have 25 minutes to get to the car otherwise your reservation will be automatically cancelled. You can rebook a specific car only once.
It's that simple.


Please, before downloading the app, consult with the Terms and Conditions here: https://mollimo.hu/hu/legal
For more info, please visit https://mollimo.hu or call our 0-24 helpdesk at 00 36 1 776 7176.

To use our service, the app will ask for accessing your camera (so you can upload photos of both pages of your driving license for the registration) and plus you will have to allow the location sharing as well (so we can show you how far the chosen car is from you)
When registering we will need your DOB (only adults over 20 years old can use our service), details of your driving licence (necessary for driving a car), and your home address, as we will issue the bills after the usage.

Get everything delivered to your doorstep with Grab – the leading ride-hailing, taxi, food delivery, and grocery app in Southeast Asia!

We offer essential everyday services to over 670 million people across Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, Cambodia, and Myanmar.

Grab offers various ride-hailing options, including 4-wheel and 2-wheel rides, and taxi booking. Grab also offers a diverse range of services including food order delivery from restaurants, prompt package delivery, and groceries from supermarkets, making it a leading taxi app and delivery platform.

Experience convenience like never before with Grab – your all-in-one solution for ride-hailing, food delivery, groceries, and more!

Book a ride for any occasion and budget
Order a ride on Grab, the top ride-hailing and taxi app in Southeast Asia. Choose from a variety of transport modes, including cars, motorbikes, and buses, and get matched with a professional driver in minutes.

Food delivery for any craving
GrabFood: a leading food delivery app that allows you to easily order food from your favourite restaurants and get it delivered to your doorstep, making it convenient and hassle-free

Conveniently order food and groceries for delivery
GrabMart is a convenient food delivery app that allows you to order groceries and handpicked fresh produce from your favourite supermarket.

Secure and seamless cashless payments
GrabPay: A safe and secure mobile wallet where you can easily pay for Grab services, such as food and grocery delivery and taxis, as well as at local merchants

Reliable on-demand package delivery
GrabExpress: Order affordable, fast, and reliable courier service with insurance for your items

Rewards for using Grab
GrabRewards: Order food, ride and earn reward points for every dollar you spend and use them to redeem deals in the GrabRewards catalogue

Grab is the only ride-hailing and food-delivery app you need. Whether you are searching for a taxi app, express food delivery, or grocery delivery, Grab has got you covered.

In addition to our renowned ride-hailing, taxi, and food delivery services, we also strive to promote economic empowerment for everyone in the region. We provide financial services such as wealth management, lending, cashless payments, and insurance.

Find out more about us at www.grab.com.
Grab offers the ability for users to receive personalized targeted advertising, offers, and updates from Grab and its partners and communications/advertising from certain third-party apps based on activity on your devices. Users may exercise opt-out choices under the Privacy and Consent Management sections within Settings within the app. For further details, you may refer to our Privacy Policy at www.grab.com/privacy.

Roamy — turn saved posts into real trips

Thousands of travel videos saved across your Instagram and TikTok… and zero time to turn them into a plan? You can’t search those folders, you keep rewatching clips to find the exact spot, pinning places on Google Maps takes forever, and spreadsheets don’t tell you how far anything is. We get it. Trip planning from scratch is painful—and your saved folder is begging to be used.

Roamy fixes the mess. With one tap, pull every location mentioned in a video, drop them onto a map, and see your entire collection of spots—clearly, visually, and all in one place. When you’re ready to go, just tell Roamy how many days you have. We’ll build a sensible, day-by-day itinerary that connects the dots for you. Trip planning, minus the stress.

Who Roamy is for
- You’ve got dozens of folders and thousands of saved travel posts across Instagram and TikTok.
- You love picking the spots—but hate the logistics.
- You want everything in one place: your saved locations, a clean map, and a plan that actually fits your days.

How it works

- 1-tap save from socials: Import places from TikTok/Instagram with a single click. Roamy detects locations mentioned in the video and adds them for you.
- See everything on a map: No more scattered folders or notes. Your saved spots appear on a clean map so you can visualize your trip at a glance.
- Your master collection: Keep every restaurant, landmark, café, and hidden gem in one organized list—with links back to the original posts and reviews.
- Get your perfect itinerary: Tell Roamy your trip length and we’ll arrange your days into a logical route so you’re not zig-zagging across town.
- Duplicate & share trips: Copy community guides or friends’ itineraries and customize them to your style—or share your own with a link.
- Review & go: Tap any spot for details, tips, and prep notes so you know exactly why it’s on your list.

Why people love it
- Turns chaos into clarity: Your social saves become a visual, actionable plan.
- Saves hours: Stop rewatching videos and manually pinning.
- Keeps your taste: It’s your collection—Roamy just organizes it and makes it trip-ready.
- Stress-free planning: From “I saved it” to “I’m going” in a few taps

Join our community of avid travelers—share your trip and get inspired on where to go next:  https://discord.gg/5YvVUcVgNy

Travel Booking Made Easy: Compare and Book Train, Bus, Flight and Ferry tickets with Omio! 

Omio makes planning your next trip simple. Compare and book train, ferry, flight, and bus tickets — all in one place!
Whether you're planning to travel by train with National Rail, booking a bus trip with National Express, flying with Flybe, or taking a ferry with P&O Ferries, Omio makes travel easy. With access to over 45 countries and more than 2,000 trusted transport providers, booking tickets for your next trip has never been simpler!
And we’re not stopping there—you can now use the Omio app to book buses and flights in Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Singapore and Vietnam. Not only are we launching South East Asia, but we’re also venturing into South America, offering buses and flights in Brazil. So, as well as London to Paris, you can also book travel tickets from Kuala Lumpur to Singapore, São Paulo to Rio de Janeiro, and many more.

Why Choose Omio?
All-in-One Travel: Book tickets for trains, buses, flights, or ferries quickly and compare prices across top UK providers and Europe’s largest names like DB, ÖBB and SNCF.
Easy to Use: Discover the best routes and book tickets in just a few taps, pay securely in GBP or Euros, and receive mobile tickets directly on your phone.
Exclusive Discounts on Tickets: Students, frequent travellers, and more can enjoy discounts on tickets through special offers, referral programs, and loyalty cards.
Live Updates: Receive real-time updates on your trip, including platform changes, delays, and gate information.
Mobile Tickets: Save time by adding your train, bus, plane and ferry tickets directly to the app. Skip the lines and get your ticket ready whenever you need it.
Support at the Palm of Your Hand: Omio provides 24/7 international customer service, ensuring you’re always covered, no matter where you are.

Travel with the best train providers:
Book train tickets with trusted providers across Europe and North America, including National Rail, Eurostar, SBB, SNCF, Trenitalia, Deutsche Bahn (DB), Renfe, Italo, and Iryo.
Travel in the UK by train with Greater Anglia, GWR, LNER, ScotRail, Northern Rail, East Midlands Trains, Southern Railway, West Midlands Railway and CrossCountry, alongside Heathrow and Gatwick Express.
Travel across borders with NS International, SNCB, and ÖBB, or choose high-speed trains with OUIGO, VR Finland, SJ Sweden and Comboios de Portugal.
Plan your trips in North America by train with Amtrak or Via Rail.

Book bus tickets effortlessly:
Travel with major bus operators — National Express and FlixBus in the UK and Europe, as well as ALSA, BlaBlaCar bus and RegioJet.
Embark on North American bus trips with OurBus and RedCoach.
Book local and regional buses like Vy Buss, Socibus, PKS, Avanza Bus, Rede Expressos, Infobus, Itabus, MarinoBus and IberoCoach.

Flight tickets in a few taps:
Discover flights with leading airlines such as Ryanair, easyJet, British Airways, Wizz Air, Vueling and Eurowings.
Book flight tickets for regional flights across the UK.

Sail smoothly on ferries:
Book ferry tickets with reliable operators like Balearia, Blue Star Ferries, GNV, Mobylines, NLG, Positano Jet, Seajets, Snav and Travelmar, providing connections across Europe, and the UK.

Join Over 28 Million Travellers Who Trust Omio
With an impressive 4.7/5 rating on Trustpilot from over 1,500 reviews, Omio is the go-to platform for travellers looking for a reliable travel experience to plan your trip and book tickets.

Contact
Need Help? We're Here for You!
If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to us at help.omio.com/hc/en-us

Stay Connected
Follow Omio for the latest travel updates, tips, and exclusive offers:

Instagram: https://instagram.com/Omio/

Teljesen megújult dizájnnal és izgalmas funkciókkal jelentkezik az OMV&SuperShop applikáció!
FONTOS!
A frissítés után érdemes az alkalmazásból kilépni majd újra belépni, hogy az esetleges hibákat megelőzzük. Emellett, aki esetleg nem tud belépni, az tud elfelejtett jelszó funkcióval újat kérni, aminek a megadása után már újra be fog tudni lépni az alkalmazásba.
